db:abstract.db:para: Presents a series of categorized data as a percentage of each category.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The data is drawn as a series of uniformly sized vertically stacked bars, with one bar per category. Each bar set added to the series contributes a single segment to each stacked bar. The segment size corresponds to the percentage of the segment value compared with the total value of all segments in the stack. Bars with zero value are not drawn.
